definition: free software (i.e. software for which sharing, modification etc is permitted)
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

pinyin: Zi4 you2 Ruan3 jian4 Ji1 jin1 hui4

sentences.english: People contribute to free software in many ways.
sentences.chinese: 人們用多種方式爲自由軟件做貢獻。

sentences.english: Stallman's crusade for free software started with a printer.
sentences.chinese: 斯托曼的自由軟件改革始於打印機。

sentences.english: Free software develops under the control of its users.
sentences.chinese: 在用戶的手中，自由軟件逐漸發展壯大。

sentences.english: Free software users have no objection to help files.
sentences.chinese: 自由軟件用戶不反對幫助文件。

sentences.english: It's free software with a liberal open source license.
sentences.chinese: 它是自由軟件，有一個自由的開放源碼許可。

sentences.english: Stallman's life continues to revolve around the promotion of free software.
sentences.chinese: 斯托曼的一生仍然致力於自由軟件的推行。

sentences.english: By contrast, free software culture has two sources.
sentences.chinese: 相反，自由軟件文化有兩個起源。

sentences.english: The COLLECTIVE are enjoying growing popularity in the free software community.
sentences.chinese: 這些工具集在自由軟件社區變得越來越受歡迎。

sentences.english: The PCB design has been prepared with the free PCB program.
sentences.chinese: PCB設計是通過自由軟件PCB完成的。

sentences.english: What are restricted and non-free software?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是受限和非自由軟件？

sentences.english: I believe that it takes the entire Free Software community to meet the challenges of today.
sentences.chinese: 我相信今天的挑戰需要整個自由軟件社區來面對。

sentences.english: The longer they have been using it, the deeper it runs.
sentences.chinese: 他們使用自由軟件越久，這種哲學越深。

sentences.english: Nearly all open source software is free software.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有開源軟件都是自由軟件。
